set.name: Custom Set - First Age - Among the Outlaws

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After the 3rd Dilemma objective is added to the victory display, advance to stage 2A and remove Fellowship With The Outlaws from the game.
Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, reveal the top card of the dilemma deck.
If there are 7 cards in the dilemma deck discard pile, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
The first player gains control of Forweg.
Forced: Forweg declares and resolves an attack against a random Woodmen enemy engaged with the first player at the end of the combat phase.
If Forweg leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Allies cannot attack or defend against Forweg.
Forced: After Forweg makes his first attack each round, he engages the next player and makes an immediate attack (discard and deal a new shadow card for this attack).

property.name: Text
property.value:
The first player gains control of Androg.
Each Woodmen enemy gets -5 engagement cost for each Corruption on heroes the first player controls.
If Androg leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Androg gets +1 Û for each hero you control with at least 1 Corruption.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Forweg declares an attack on Larnach's Daughter. The first player may declare an eligible defender against this attack. If no character is destroyed by this attack, add Larnach's Daughter to the victory display. If no defender is declared, each player deals 3 Corruption among characters he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either each player must discard the character he controls with the fewest hit points to remove all damage from one character he controls, or add Cull the Weak to the victory display and each player must deal 3 damage to a hero he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either each player must exhaust a character he controls to discard a Woodmen enemy from play, or add Punish The Trespassers to the victory display and each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Woodmen enemy and put it into play engaged with him. One of these must be Hound of the Woodmen, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either each player deals X Corruption to a hero he controls to add X resources to that hero's resource pool, or add Raid The Homestead to the victory display and discard all resources from play (any hero that does not discard a resource takes 2 damage).

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either each player must deal 1 Corruption to a hero he controls to reduce his threat by 3, or add Turn A Blind Eye to the victory display and exhaust all heroes in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Teiglin Hunter is engaged with a player, all enemies engaged with that player get +1 Û.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: All enemies engaged with the defending player get +1 Û until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the start of the encounter phase, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the staging area. This ability does not stack with other copies of Hound of the Woodmen.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Homestead Defender is engaged with a player, Woodmen enemies engaged with that player not named Homestead Defender cannot be attacked by non-objective characters.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: All enemies engaged with the defending player get +2 Ú until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After an attack against Desperate Outlaw resolves, Desperate Outlaw makes an immediate attack against the defending player.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: The attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Cruel Robber attacks, discard 1 attachment the defending player controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard 1 attachment from the defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Driven Outcast attacks, deal 1 damage to the defending character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack resolves, deal 1 damage to the defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
(Stage 1B) Response: After Forest Clearing is explored, reduce each player's threat by 2.
While Forest Clearing is in play, the first Gaurwaith enemy revealed each round gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Scattered Homestead is in the staging area, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck at the end of the round until an enemy is discarded. Add that enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
(Stage 1B) Response: After Tilled Field is explored, add 1 resource to each hero's resource pool.
(Stage 2B) When Revealed: Each player must exhaust a hero he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value:
(Stage 1B): While Hedge and Stockade is the active location, all Woodmen enemies get +2 Ú and 0 engagement cost.
(Stage 2B): While Hedge and Stockade is the active location, all Gaurwaith enemies get -1 Û and 0 engagement cost.

property.name: Text
property.value:
(Stage 1B) Response: After Woods of Teiglin is explored, each player draws 1 card.
(Stage 2B): While Woods of Teiglin is in the staging area, all Gaurwaith enemies get +1 $, +1 Û, and +1 Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: Either deal X damage among heroes he controls, where X is equal to the number of engaged Woodmen enemies plus 2, or treat the printed text box of each non-objective character he controls as if it were blank, except for keywords and Traits, until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Woodmen enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Then, each engaged Woodmen enemy makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either Either each player must immediately exhaust and commit 1 hero to the quest, or raise each player's threat by 4.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy. If that enemy is destroyed, deal 1 Corruption to the defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player engaged with a Gaurwaith enemy must discard all resources he controls. If a player did not discard at least 3 resources, deal 1 damage to each character he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: The defending player must pay 1 resource or the attacking enemy gets +3 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player deals X damage among characters he controls, where X is the number of Gaurwaith enemies engaged with that player.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1Û for each enemy engaged with the defending player.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must choose: Either raise his threat by 1 for each Corruption on characters he controls, or choose one character with at least 1 Corruption. That character is immediately corrupted.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust all characters the defending player controls with at least 1 Corruption.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the hero with Curse of Morgoth attached. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: After an ally enters play, exhaust attached hero to deal 1 damage to that ally.")

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove each character with at least 1 Corruption from the quest.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck. If it is an enemy or location, add it to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to the hero with Curse of Morgoth attached.
Response: After the players travel to a location, choose a player and exhaust attached hero to reduce that player's threat by the $ of the active location.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Setup: Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 Ú and +1 hit point.
Response: Add Hardship of the Wild to the victory display, and remove it from the campaign pool, to cancel 2 points of damage just dealt to attached hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set all enemy and treachery cards with the Gaurwaith trait aside, out of play. Shuffle all Dilemma cards together into a dilemma deck. Add Fellowship with the Outlaws to the staging area. Put Forweg and Androg into play, ally side faceup. Each player searches the encounter deck for a different location and adds it to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: The players must travel to a location during the travel phase, if able.
Forced: After the active location is explored, deal X Corruption among characters the first player controls. X is the $ of that location.
Forced: After a Woodmen enemy is destroyed, add 1 progress to Fellowship Among the Outlaws and 1 Corruption to each character that participated in the attack. (If Forweg or Androg participated in the attack, deal 1 Corruption to each hero controlled by the engaged player.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Flip Forweg and Androg to their enemy sides, remove all tokens from them, and place them in the staging area. Discard all Woodmen enemies. Remove all enemy and treachery cards with the Woodmen trait from the encounter deck and discard pile and set them aside, out of play. Shuffle the set aside enemy and treachery cards with the Gaurwaith trait into the encounter deck. Reveal 1 encounter card per player.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Gaurwaith enemies may be attacked with Ò instead of Û. If an enemy would be damaged this way, place progress tokens on it instead of damage tokens. When an enemy has progress equal to its hit points, add it to the victory display and place those progress tokens on the quest.
When Revealed: Place 5 progress tokens on this quest stage for each card in the discard pile of the dilemma deck.
The players cannot defeat this stage while Forweg is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Campaign Mode.
Response: Discard the top card of the dilemma deck to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Add Bitterness of Exile to the campaign pool. If there is at least 1 card in the dilemma deck discard pile, add Cruel of Heart to the campaign pool. These burdens have been earned by the players. Each player may attach a copy of Hardship of the Wild to a hero he controls. If there are no cards in the dilemma deck discard pile, add Craft In Wood And Field to the campaign pool. These boons have been earned by the players.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 1 Corruption from Bór the Faithful to ready him. He gets +2 Û and +1 Ò until the end of the round. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a treachery card is revealed, discard a card from hand (spend 1 Î to discard the top card of your deck instead). If the first letter of the treachery card's title matches that of the discarded card, cancel the "when revealed" effects of the revealed card. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Brethil Hound participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, choose a player. That player reduces his threat by 1. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When the discard pile is shuffled back into the encounter deck, deal X Corruption to Algund to choose X cards in the discard pile. These cards are not shuffled back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard Fostered Son to reduce the cost of the next unique Edain character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Wolf-man to immediately declare him as an attacker (and resolve his attack) against an engaged enemy with one hit point remaining.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to Túrin Turambar. Limit 1 Name in play.
Resources on Neithan can be discarded to satisfy the ransom keyword.
Response: When an enemy with the ransom keyword is defeated, add 2 resources to Neithan.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to a Dwarf character.
Action: Exhaust Forge of Belegost and attached character to heal X damage on a character. X is the number of Item attachments on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to a Dwarf character.
Action: Exhaust Forge of Belegost and attached character to heal X damage on a character. X is the number of Item attachments on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Ready each character with an Oath attached. (Lower the cost of None Shall Break by 2 if each character that readies takes 1 Corruption.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an encounter card with at least 3 $ is revealed from the encounter deck, choose and ready a character. That character gets +2 Ò, +2 Û, and +2 Ú until the end of the round.
